_header: There is a thing as I suppose

CULDd575.Transcription:
Ther ys a thyng as I supposeWhich hath a face but never a
                    nosehath a mouthe but no toth therinhath a bearde but never a
                    chin
CULDd575.Note:
‘a placht’ written to right. Formerly on a flyleaf of
                    Formerly on a flyleaf of Cambridge UK,  Cambridge University Library Dd.5.76.
